caption.center: STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT v. JOSEPH LESLIE EVERHART, APPELLANT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM DIVISION NO. 1 CIRCUIT COURT, CASS COUNTY; WILLIAM M. KIMBERLIN, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
Cenobio Lozano, Jr. and Leonard L. Smith, Harrisonville, for appellant.
John Ashcroft, Atty. Gen., Kristie Green, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before SOMERVILLE, P.J., TURNAGE, C.J., and MANFORD, J.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] This is a direct appeal from a jury conviction for rape, in violation of ยง 566.030, RSMo 1978.
[2] No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion.
[3] Judgment affirmed.
[4] All concur.
[5] Rule 30.25(b).
